devdoc.author: Solmate (https://github.com/transmissions11/solmate/blob/main/src/utils/SafeTransferLib.sol)
devdoc.details: Use with caution! Some functions in this library knowingly create dirty bits at the destination of the free memory pointer.Note that none of the functions in this library check that a token has code at all! That responsibility is delegated to the caller.

userdoc.notice: Safe ETH and ERC20 transfer library that gracefully handles missing return values.
